mapper.select: SELECT m.member_idx, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_phone, m.member_email, m.member_nickName, m.member_roadAddr, m.member_parcelAddr, m.member_detailAddr, m.member_dongAddr, m.member_birth, m.member_gender, m.member_regDate, m.member_subs, m.member_renew, m.member_loginLock, m.member_quit, s.subsType_code, sh.subsHistory_start, sh.subsHistory_exp FROM member m LEFT JOIN subs s ON m.member_idx = s.member_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sh.member_idx, MAX(sh.subsHistory_start) as subsHistory_start, MAX(sh.subsHistory_exp) as subsHistory_exp FROM subshistory sh WHERE sh.member_idx = #{param1} GROUP BY sh.member_idx ) sh ON m.member_idx = sh.member_idx WHERE m.member_idx = #{param1}

SELECT m.member_idx, m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_phone, m.member_email, m.member_dongAddr, m.member_subs, m.member_renew, m.member_loginLock, (SELECT s.subsType_code FROM subs s WHERE s.member_idx = m.member_idx) AS subsType_code FROM member m LEFT JOIN subs s ON m.member_idx = s.member_idx
WHERE member_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2}, '%')
WHERE member_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2}, '%')
WHERE member_dongAddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2}, '%')
WHERE subsType_code =1
WHERE subsType_code =2
WHERE subsType_code =3
WHERE subsType_code =4
ORDER BY m.member_idx DESC LIMIT #{param3} OFFSET #{param4}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(m.member_idx)/#{param1}) AS pages FROM member m LEFT JOIN subs s ON m.member_idx = s.member_idx
WHERE member_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param3}, '%')
WHERE member_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param3}, '%')
WHERE member_dongAddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param3}, '%')
WHERE subsType_code =1
WHERE subsType_code =2
WHERE subsType_code =3
WHERE subsType_code =4
mapper.update: UPDATE subs SET subsType_code = #{param1} WHERE member_idx = #{param2}
